_tutorial_zh: 此文件定义武器的特殊效果，使用 JavaScript 语法
onHurt: 自己被攻击时触发
whenHeld: 主手持有时触发 (每5tick)
self: 持有武器的玩家/实体
victim: 受害者 (onHit/onKill) 或攻击者 (onHurt)
_tutorial_en: This file defines special weapon effects using JavaScript syntax
onKill: Triggered when killing an enemy
onHurt: Triggered when you are attacked
whenHeld: Triggered while held in main hand (every 5 ticks)
self: The player/entity holding the weapon
